创立（新思想）；创造，发明（新方法） </seg>

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)used euphemistically to refer to sexual intercourse
used euphemistically to refer to a penis
(proverb)a son's character or behaviour can be expected to resemble that of his father

entry.def: Your father is your male parent. You can also call someone your father if he brings you up as if he was this man.

example.ex: He would be a good father to my children.
example.tran: 对我的孩子们来说，他会是个好父亲。

entry.def: When a man fathers a child, he makes a woman pregnant and their child is born.

example.ex: She claims Mark fathered her child...
example.tran: 她宣称马克是孩子的父亲。

example.ex: He fathered at least three children by the wives of other men.
example.tran: 他跟别人的老婆至少生了 3 个孩子。

entry.def: The man who invented or started something is sometimes referred to as the father of that thing.
entry.tran: 发明者;鼻祖;创始人;奠基人

example.ex: ...Max Dupain, regarded as the father of modern photography.
example.tran: 被视为现代摄影之父的马克斯·杜培

example.ex: ...Mahatma Gandhi, the founding father of independent India.
example.tran: 圣雄甘地，引领印度实现独立的国父

entry.def: In some Christian churches, priests are addressed or referred to as Father .

example.ex: I would like your advice on a matter of conscience, Father.
example.tran: 我想就一件有关良心的事征求您的建议，神父。

entry.def: Christians often refer to God as our Father or address him as Father .

means.word_mean: 1. a male parent (also used as a term of address to your father);
3. a person who holds an important or distinguished position in some organization;

sentences.sentence: "the tennis fathers ruled in her favor"

means.word_mean: 4. a person who founds or establishes some institution;

sentences.sentence: "George Washington is the father of his country"

means.word_mean: 5. the head of an organized crime family

sentences.sentence: "Men often father children but don't recognize them"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English fæder, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch vader and German Vater, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin pater and Greek patēr

sentences.cn: 神父: 我亲爱的, 编写一份煎饼,并找到大型抄网请给我!
sentences.en: Father: My dear, prepare a pancake and find a big tuck net for me, please!

sentences.cn: 圣父 、 圣携程网订机票母是道教对真武神父母的尊称.
sentences.en: The Holy Father , the Virgin Mary is the true warrior Taoism parents Prudence.

sentences.cn: 他必须要碰碰运气,看能不能避开Bamabas和Dreosan神父了.
sentences.en: He would have to chance his luck against Bamabas and Father Dreosan.

sentences.cn: 神父电汇给这个贫苦村民的儿子一些钱供他继续学习.
sentences.en: Father cabled the poor villager's son some money for his further study.

sentences.cn: 多诺万神父没有动. 他的眼睛直直落在那块菜园上.
sentences.en: Father Donovan did not move. His eyes were on the vegetable garden.

sentences.cn: 神父, 你能为一位女士祈祷 吗 ?
sentences.en: Father, would you say a prayer to Our Lady an intervention?

sentences.cn: 隐修院院长神父, 暴跳如雷的副主教, 是什么惹得他们在头脑里燃起怒火?
sentences.en: Abbas father, furious dean, what offence laid fire to their brains?

sentences.cn: “谢谢你的帮忙, 神父, ”罗密欧感激地说道. “再会. ”
sentences.en: Thank you for all your help, Father, said Romeo gratefully. Farewell.

sentences.cn: 弗雷德神父成了遥远的远东地区的农夫.
sentences.en: Father Fred is a farmer in the farther Far East.

sentences.cn: 你当然有告诉你先生, 你和罗根神父见过面吧!
sentences.en: You told your husband , of course, that you had just seen Father Logan?

sentences.cn: 在忏悔室,苏里凡神父认出了她,问起了她的工作,她向他解释说,自己是做商业演出的舞蹈演员.
sentences.en: In the confessional Father Sullivan recognized her and began asking her about her work.

sentences.cn: 天父，宽恕我们吧。
sentences.en: Father, forgive us.

sentences.cn: 天父
sentences.en: God the Father

sentences.cn: 我们的天父
sentences.en: ...Our Father in Heaven.

sentences.cn: 天父, 求你圣化2008年在悉尼举办的普世青年节.
sentences.en: God Our Father, we consecrate to you the World Youth Day in Sydney in 2008.

sentences.cn: 我们必需从天父那里学习和向最严重的罪人总是显示爱.
sentences.en: We have to learn from Father and show love to the biggest sinner ever exist.

sentences.cn: 他们也会为人所爱,但最重要的是, 为我们的天父耶和华上帝所爱.
sentences.en: Then they will be loved men but most of all by Jehovah, our heavenly Father.

sentences.cn: 假如缺乏一位众人的天父,我们怎能够把人类看作为一个大家庭 呢 ?
sentences.en: And how can we see this way without the presence of a Father of all?

sentences.cn: 如果你们饶恕他们的过失, 你们的天父也必将饶恕你们的过失.
sentences.en: If you forgive men their trespasses, your Heavenly Father will also forgive you.

sentences.cn: 你们要完全, 正像你们的天父是完全的.
sentences.en: You, therefore, must be perfect, as your heavenly Father is perfect.

sentences.cn: 敬虔的父亲当以如天父的品格和话语来带领子女为主而活.
sentences.en: Theme : Godly fathering influences children to live for God by modeling godly character and speech.

sentences.cn: 作为天父, 在新的一年里您回要求您的子民做 什么 ?
sentences.en: As a Father, what would you ask your vhildren to do for the new year?

sentences.cn: 我们决定外出一天,父亲说不管怎样,他都要张罗一笔钱.
sentences.en: We decided to have a day out and Father said he'd raise the wind somehow.

sentences.cn: 天父, 在天之父. 阿门!
sentences.en: Our Father, who art in Heaven . Amen!

sentences.cn: 主祭: 愿天父的慈爱,基督的圣宠,圣神的恩赐(共融),与你们同在.
sentences.en: PRIEST: Pray sacrificeacceptable to God, the almighty Father.

sentences.cn: 所以你们要完全 、 像你们的天父完全一样.
sentences.en: Be perfect , therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect.

sentences.cn: 如果我们这样做的话,我们就能够和天父和他的儿子在真理中相交.
sentences.en: If we do this we will have fellowship with the Father and His Son in truth.

sentences.cn: 我认为,天父发明人类,是因为儿子使他失望了.
sentences.en: I believe that our heavenly father invented man because he was disappointed in the monkey.

sentences.cn: 神是我们的天父.
sentences.en: God is our heavenly Father.

sentences.cn: 我们的天父知道我们一切的需要.
sentences.en: Our Heavenly Father knows our every need.

sentences.cn: 哦,天父, 天上的真神, 愿尊祢名为圣.
sentences.en: Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name.

sentences.cn: 也就是说,我们必须全心全意、遵行天父的旨意.
sentences.en: And it's about having a heart of full surrender to the will of our Father.

sentences.cn: 那就是我们的天父.
sentences.en: That is our heavenly father.

sentences.cn: 我们周围的世界就是我们的天父的智慧的见证.
sentences.en: The world all around us is witness to the wisdom of our Father.

sentences.cn: 从上帝我们的天父那里,一个祝福天使降临了.
sentences.en: From God our heavenly Father a blessed angel came.

sentences.cn: 天父救我, 在你身边给我保留一个位置!
sentences.en: Father help me, save me a place by your side!

sentences.cn: 在痛苦中独处,使我们更贴近天父,也更看清自己.
sentences.en: Solitude and affliction bring more to themselves and to their heavenly Father than any other means.

sentences.cn: 我们的天父也是一直与我们同在.
sentences.en: Our Heavenly Father is always present with us.

sentences.cn: 基督要人人都认明他与天父的关系.
sentences.en: Christ desired all to know His relationship with His Father.

sentences.cn: 因为这一切都是外邦人所寻求的; 你们的天父原晓得你们需要这一切.
sentences.en: All these things pagans seek. Your heavenly Father knows that you need them all.

sentences.cn: 我们的祷告应当首先将荣誉归于天父,其次才是我们的需要.
sentences.en: Our prayers should be primarily about bringing glory to the Father and then about our needs.

sentences.cn: 奥克兰的阿明·布朗特成为父亲时, 便停止闯黄灯.
sentences.en: When Armin Brott of Oakland became a father, he stopped running yellow lights.

sentences.cn: 在罗曼制造(一家变压器和焊接设备制造企业,由罗伯特·罗斯的父亲与其他人于1080年共同创立),罗伯种·罗斯密切的关注着他手下将近200名员工的年齡。
sentences.en: At RoMan Manufacturing, a maker of electrical transformers and welding equipment that his father confounded in 1980, Robert Roth keep a close eye on the age of his nearly 200 workers,

sentences.cn: 我们的创立人相信民主要求智慧.
sentences.en: Our Founding Fathers believed that democracy demands wisdom.

sentences.cn: 乔治华盛顿被认为是美国的创立者.
sentences.en: George Washington is considered to be the founding father of the United States of America.

sentences.cn: 他创立了著名诗人的流派.
sentences.en: He fathered a school of notable poets.

sentences.cn: 我父亲多年奋斗创立了自己的事业.
sentences.en: My father built his business on years of hard work.

sentences.cn: 我们相信上帝, 全能的父, 创造天地的主.
sentences.en: We believe in God, Father Almighty, Creator of heavens and the earth.

sentences.cn: 在我所创造的宇宙,我是一切的父.
sentences.en: AM Father of all in this universe of My own making.

sentences.cn: 我信上帝, 即全能之圣父,创造天地之主.
sentences.en: I believe in God the Father Almighty, Maker heaven and earth.

sentences.cn: 我们的天公老爷,因对猴子失望而创造了人.
sentences.en: Our heavenly father invented the man because he was disappointed in the monkey.

sentences.cn: 他父亲帮助创造了一套全新的生意经。
sentences.en: His father had helped invent a whole new way of doing business.

sentences.cn: 帕斯卡为了协助父亲, 利用齿轮原理, 发明了第一台可以执行加减运算计算器.
sentences.en: Pascal To help his father, use gear theory, invented the first calculator can perform additionsubtraction operations.

sentences.cn: 格雷汉姆·贝尔是电话的发明人.
sentences.en: Graham Bell was the father of telephone.

sentences.cn: 我认为,天父发明人类,是因为儿子使他失望了.
sentences.en: I believe that our heavenly father invented man because he was disappointed in the monkey.

sentences.cn: 他有过许多发明.
sentences.en: He fathered many inventions.

sentences.cn: 贝尔是电话的发明者.
sentences.en: A . G . Bell was the father of the telephone.
